abstract: NBA Roundup; New York Knicks defeat Toronto Raptors, 103-93.
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony (knee), Kristaps Porzingis (upper respiratory illness) and Jose Calderon (groin) did not play as the Knicks absorbed their fourth straight loss.

headline.main: Knicks Limp to a Defeat in Toronto
headline.print_headline: Raptors Quell Knicks’ Rally to Set Record

snippet: Carmelo Anthony (knee), Kristaps Porzingis (upper respiratory illness) and Jose Calderon (groin) did not play as the Knicks absorbed their fourth straight loss.
